boardgame.name: Patchistory
パッチヒストリー
패치스토리(Limited Edition)
boardgame.description: Patchistory is a strategy board game with cards that symbolize historical heroes and wonders, with the whole game being divided into three eras. During the game, you acquire these cards through auctions and expand your territory by placing cards so that they overlap one another in a 5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;times;5 space in the first era, a 6_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;times;6 space in the second era, and a 7_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;times;7 space in the third era. When your land_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;that is, the layout of your cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;is well built, the card functions are activated. You can earn victory points with diplomatic actions, domestic politics, war movement, the actions of production, etc., and at the end of the game, the person with the highest score after the third era wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Because you can make combos with lots of features on historical cards and you can score in various ways, Patchistory will give you another new exciting play every time it hits the table._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;패치스토리는 역사테마의 전략보드게임입니다. 본 게임은 유구한 인류사에 있어서 역사적인 영웅, 기념비적인 건축물에 대한 역사카드가 각각 1,2,3시대로 구성되어 있습니다. 이런 역사카드들을 경매로 가져와 1시대에는 5*5, 2시대는 6*6, 3시대는 7*7 칸의 범위 내에서 겹치게 배치하여 자신만의 역사를 만들어 갑니다. 이렇게 완성된 자신만의 역사에서 그 카드들의 기능들이 발동하게 되고 외교, 내정, 이동 전쟁, 생산 등등의 액션으로 점수를 얻게 되는데_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;이때 3시대까지 점수를 가장 많이 얻는 사람이 승리하게 됩니다._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;패치스토리의 매력은 다양한 역사카드의 여러 가지 기능들에 의한 콤보가 발동되고 그로인한 점수 획득방법이 다양하여 게임 할 때마다 매번 새로운 재미를 준다는 점입니다._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Selling 1 copy of the english Limited Edition (one of worldwide 50 copies), released at the SPIEL Essen, 2013. Condition is NEW, Shrinkwrap unbroken and original sealed. Offer is including the Essen-Promotional cards in Korean language. Shipment (via DHL): Germany: Parcel (insured) 6,90 € European Union: Parcel (insured) 17,00 € (excluding Overseas and Departments, etc) Russia, Ukraine, Norway, Iceland, Switzerland: Parcel 30,00€ (insured 38,50€) USA, Canada, Israel, Egypt, Tunisia: Parcel 36,00€ (insured 52,00€) All other Countries: Parcel 42,00€ (insured 66,00€) Insurance is up to 500€. Payment: Within Euro-zone the EU-standard-bank-transfer (SEPA, IBAN/BIC) is recommended, it´s quick, save and causes no fees. Paypal is certainly also possible, fees within EU are 0,35 Euro + 1,9% of the total. Worldwide (outside the EURO-zone) Paypal is recommended. Since October 2011 PP-fees are 0,35 Euro + (3,9% - 5,2%) of the total + (if used) credit-card-fees. For nearly all countries outside Europe, apart from USA and Canada (both 3,9%), the rate is 5.2%. Paypal does not allow uninsured shipment above 25 Euro (exception personal payments) and shipments to any other address than the one submitted with the payment. The fees of the payment method you choose and the real shipping costs the buyer have to pay.
Played once. Cards sleeved and includes North American promo set.

I did not put which edition I have because I am not sure. I pre-ordered this a long time ago and pretty much forgot about it. By the time it arrived, my game-playing was almost strictly 2-player with my husband and we don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t particularly like 2-player games with auction/bidding as one of the mechanics. My box cover has _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Patchistory_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; in gold foil, which is not one of the choices when you pick which edition. The promo cards and plastic sleeves are what I got from pre-ordering. I removed the outer shrinkwrap so that I could include the promo tiles. But the promo tiles and the tiles from the base game are still factory sealed. The components are not punched. Included is a 100 pack of square clear sleeves for the tiles. The box is in mint condition. Comes from a smoke-free home.
Complete and comes from a smoke free home. Buyer pays actual shipping.

StuntKite Publishing (STK001) Patchistory is a Civ-building game played across three Eras, in which 2-4 players bid for new Heroes, Wonders, and Buildings to add to their burgeoning empires. Players must then _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Patch_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; these tiles to their existing tableau following specific rules. The goal is to generate the most Culture by the end of the game; but to do that, players must manage their resource output, military strength, economy, and diplomatic alliances. The English edition of Patchistory features all upgraded components, minor rules changes, and new art.
